channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NM

item.title: Report X-2023080573
item.description:
Report X-2023080573

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-29T21:11:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-01
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was being unloaded from trailer when package handler noticed box was damaged. Manager placed package in bin and brought package to QA for inspection. DescribePack: Box was stained black. Inspection of the inside revealed that an entire side of the box was blackened. The aluminum bucket had a big dent on the side of the bucket that also dented the lid. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a bin and then placed on top of a grate to catch any further release from the package during inspection. Once the leak was found on the top of the aluminum bucket. The item was then placed inside a hazmat bin to prevent anymore movement.

item.title: Report X-2023080514
item.description:
Report X-2023080514

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-28T18:15:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-28
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found on van on its side and found the top part of packaging to have been slightly damp. Took to QA station to investigate. No surrounding packages damaged, leakage was totally contained within packaging. Proceeded to complete the damaged Hazmat procedure. DescribePack: Found contents to have had a loose cap which caused slight leakage throughout the packaging. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Took to a QA station and placed over a spill pan to prevent any unforeseeable leakage to further damage anything else.
